item.title: When Preferences Diverge: Aligning Diffusion Models with Minority-Aware Adaptive DPO
item.description: Adaptive Diffusion Models with Minority-Aware Adaptive DPO

item.title: MagicMotion: Controllable Video Generation with Dense-to-Sparse Trajectory Guidance
item.description: MagicMotion: A controllable video generation framework enabling precise object motion control through dense-to-sparse trajectory guidance.

item.title: From Head to Tail: Towards Balanced Representation in Large Vision-Language Models through Adaptive Data Calibration
item.description: ADR balances visual-language models by adaptively calibrating long-tail data, boosting LLaVA 1.5 by 4.36% without increasing training data volume.

item.title: World Modeling Makes a Better Planner: Dual Preference Optimization for Embodied Task Planning
item.description: D2PO: World modeling enhances embodied task planning by jointly optimizing state prediction and action selection, leading to more efficient execution.

item.title: DreamRelation: Relation-Centric Video Customization
item.description: DreamRelation: Personalize videos by customizing relationships between subjects, generalizing to new domains.

item.title: Unified Reward Model for Multimodal Understanding and Generation
item.description: UNIFIEDREWARD: A unified reward model that enhances multimodal understanding and generation!

item.title: DuoDecoding: Hardware-aware Heterogeneous Speculative Decoding with Dynamic Multi-Sequence Drafting
item.description: DuoDecoding: Accelerating LLM inference by strategically deploying draft & target models on CPU & GPU for parallel decoding and dynamic drafting.

item.title: VidCRAFT3: Camera, Object, and Lighting Control for Image-to-Video Generation
item.description: VidCRAFT3 enables high-quality image-to-video generation with precise control over camera movement, object motion, and lighting, pushing the boundaries of visual content creation.

item.title: VideoRoPE: What Makes for Good Video Rotary Position Embedding?
item.description: VideoRoPE enhances video processing in Transformer models by introducing a novel 3D rotary position embedding that preserves spatio-temporal relationships, resulting in superior performance across var…

item.title: Agent-R: Training Language Model Agents to Reflect via Iterative Self-Training
item.description: Agent-R: A novel self-training framework enables language model agents to learn from errors by dynamically constructing training data that corrects erroneous actions, resulting in significantly improv…

item.title: Dolphin: Closed-loop Open-ended Auto-research through Thinking, Practice, and Feedback
item.description: DOLPHIN: AI automates scientific research from idea generation to experimental validation.

item.title: LiFT: Leveraging Human Feedback for Text-to-Video Model Alignment
item.description: LiFT leverages human feedback, including reasoning, to effectively align text-to-video models with human preferences, significantly improving video quality.

item.title: BitStack: Fine-Grained Size Control for Compressed Large Language Models in Variable Memory Environments
item.description: BitStack: Dynamic LLM sizing for variable memory!
